name: Keno S
text: We usually go to a Papa John’s in Broken Arrow, OK, however, we quit ordering there because it is more and more unsanitary every time we go in there. Last night we tried this Papa Johns in Muskogee. We live halfway in between Muskogee and …More

name: Cookie Gamer
text: I HAVE to give a SPECIAL REVIEW for Gigi W. at the Shawnee St store. I drive big rigs and had a hard, long day. I just wanted to eat and relax. On 10/15 a few people called off and it would have taken almost 2 hours for me to get my food. …More

name: Co Pilot
text: Fast and friendly service. The pizza was delicious. This is my top pick for pizza carryout or delivery in Muskogee. I've seen them so busy and understaffed but still produce great food in a very timely manner. If Giselle is there, I know I'll have A+ service!

name: Patrick Quintanilla
text: Papa johns!!! Best pizza in the area that delivers (american pie). A little pricey, but the quality is worth it. And the free peppers and garlic sauce that comes with an original crust pizza is amazing.

name: KAY ATCHISON
text: They had the BEST PIZZA!!!COURTEOUS CSR, DRIVERS FAST N FRIENDLY DANGGG THEIR CLOSED DOWN,Nooo Nooo

name: Sandra
text: This was my first visit to this PAPA JOHNS, the service was great! Jezel was awesome! Very friendly courteous and helpful, great personality! I’ll definitely be back! I got the garden veggie, it was soooo good! I would recommend this PAPA JOHNS to anyone and everyone!

name: Brennon Stickel
text: The most amazing pizza and they always take good care of us.... Love papa johns....

name: Randy Dotson
text: Good pizza, friendly service too! A rare combination these days. The manager was super nice, but I'm not very good at remembering names.

name: Shawna Points
text: Poppa John's pizza Muskogee is the BEST!!!! They are very involved with the many events, festivals, and festivities in the community!  Poppa John's pizza Muskogee staff listen to detail on their orders, deliver in a speedy time, have a …More

name: William Gaige
text: Order here for work all the time. They are fantastic with service and quality. Even whe  I order 20 pizzas at the last minute. The manager is always very helpful and helps me carry them to my car.

name: TheCoolness22
text: Website says they close at 10 but they stop taking orders for delivery much sooner than that. Travel through there often and will not be giving them a call. Good day to you papa.

name: William Aldridge
text: Jezel was incredibly great helped us out a lot even brought our pizza out to us while we were waiting and accommodated my friend who is allergic to cheese was very understanding and likable.

name: Lori Scarberry
text: Always the best ❤️❤️. Love their pizza and the service is always great!

name: Brant Barnes
text: This place is really cool, they had training pizzas coming out this weekend and they were giving them away.  The pizza was awesome and the people were super friendly.  I met one of the owner's Heath and they really run an awesome operation. …More

name: JEFF Fiser
text: I placed order online and tried to use a valid promo code for 25 % off wich was never applied after checkout.  I was put on hold for 20 min's before I could speak to anyone at the store and no resolution with the manager... I wa's then told …More

name: Kimberly Johns
text: Clean store, always delivered fresh and hot. Even have our favorite driver we request Robert Lowrance is always prompt courteous and tells us a joke.

name: Lydia Adamson
text: There one day. Gone the next. Sad. Love their pizza.

name: Kyla Wright
text: Has a great and friendly service. My order was prepared quickly and made perfectly. The pizza is amazing and is great place for familys to come to.

name: Joshua Hites
text: Pizza was awesome! Place was very clean and the lady working chatted and had sense of humor while making our delicious pizzas!

name: Mandy Rodgers
text: Love there sauce and pizza is always cheesy.

name: Morgan Pevehouse
text: Awesome pizza and service! Usually a pizzahut fan but had to find something better. Papa Johns exceeded my expectations, the crust was perfect you could actually hold it by the edge and it not go vertical & the pineapple tasted fresh. Also …More

name: Jeff Scott
text: Decided to get fast food, ordered a Hawaiian BBQ Chicken and it exceeded my expectations. Great pizza and even better deals.

name: Coal Country
text: I just went by their location, 7/6/2019, they are shut down and their space is for rent. Very sad :(

name: MSPaintWitch
text: I love their pizza so much. I really am happy that they finally got one here. Now this the only place I order pizza

name: Dymin Purdin
text: Just stumbled on this new location in front of TJ Max!!  I was so excited Muskogee got a Papa Johns!!!  I forgot how good there pizza was, but I remember now!! Seemed very clean, met Jasmine the manager at the time and had an awesome works pizza!!  This is my pizza go to IN Muskogee!

name: Nickolas McAnally
text: Excellent and very fast service. The manager is very personable and the staff is professional, addressing any issues promptly and effectively.

name: Chuck Stuart
text: Hey Domino's owner in Ardmore, you may want to call the store manager at Papa Johns in Muskogee and ask him how he runs this branch so well!

name: Faythe Ball
text: Love the pizza here and my delivery guy Robert Lowrance was so polite and respectful. You don’t see that anymore in this town.

name: Gaye Dampf
text: Great pizza as usual.  The only problem was how slow it was.

name: SickGirl_ AcidRain
text: BEST PIZZA IN TOWN. And with the app, get free pizzas sizes and it's easy. Just order and get points.

name: Dramma Hearlson
text: Seriously? One coupon per family, per visit! When each child was given their own coupon.

name: Margella Gamble
text: Great customer service. I love this place!

name: Mae Osborn
text:
I love Papa John's Pizza
They have one of the most kind and respectable driver his name is CharlesB
When I first met him he made me laugh so hard...Thanks Charles B for great servics

name: Isaac Herrera
text: I went in this past weekend while they were training and it was like they had been open for months! The staff was so polite and made my pizza to perfection! My family and I recently moved to the area and were disappointed that there was no Papa John's but were stoked to see they are having their grand opening tomorrow, we will be there!

name: Dwight Chapin
text: Our family enjoys Papa John's pizza, and when things go right we are very satisfied.  Recently on two separate orders they have burnt the crust on our pizza.  I filled out a survey on the first one, and never heard anything back from them. …More

name: eric langston
text: carmel brownies were awesome.! service was great, will definitely order from here again.!

name: Charles Bartowski
text: Got a pizza for me and my sisters mothers day dinner and it was ready to go and wonderful

name: Rach M.
text: I love their pizza! I usually order online and pick up at the store to avoid the delivery fees.

name: stacy starr
text: ordered some hot wings and they were great, definitely will order again!

name: Renee White
text: Good pizza and Jasmine Young was a pleasure very nice and informative.

name: Shawna Robinson
text: The Gentlemen who were working tonight were very friendly and funny.  You can tell they enjoy their work and make it a great experience.

name: Kathryn Wyers
text: Pizza was awesome. John was very pleasant taking my order, & the delivery driver got to my door in time.

name: QuesoMasoe
text: i was expecting to find dead babies in my pizza but suprisingly i didnt, it was alright pizza, the dead babies probably wouldve made it better but oh well

name: Awesome Bartowski

name: April Barker
text: Extremely rude on the phone. Waited over 2 hours after ordering online. I finally called and was told they couldnt find my house. They never called or emailed me of the issue.

name: Ryan K
text: Pizzas were burnt. Manager said it wasn't a big deal. Good grief. I'll never order from this location again.

name: Nicole Smith

text: Im usually a dominos fanatic and had never tried papa johns before but only had a little amount of time to spare and was near the papa johns and couldn't decide what I wanted so I went and a nice young lady named Brittany told me about …More
